meanings.definition: A person who shares a flat or apartment with others.
meanings.sent1: My flatmates and I take turns cooking dinner each night.
meanings.sent2: I have three flatmates, and we all get along well.
meanings.sent3: One of my flatmates always forgets to take out the trash!
meanings.sent4: Living with my flatmates feels like having a built-in support system.
meanings.sent5: Finding trustworthy flatmates can make apartment living much more enjoyable.

meanings.definition: The people with whom one shares a flat or apartment.
meanings.sent1: My flatmates and I are planning a movie night this weekend.
meanings.sent2: It's important to communicate openly with your flatmates to avoid misunderstandings.
meanings.sent3: My flatmates and I have a running joke about who uses up all the hot water.
meanings.sent4: Living with flatmates can teach you a lot about compromise and cooperation.
meanings.sent5: I consider my flatmates to be like an extended family away from home.
